detaileddescription.para: User data service characteristics for discovery
List of characteristics to be discovered; order matches handle index enumeration

briefdescription.para: Perform service and characteristic discovery for User Data service. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length UDSC_HDL_LIST_LEN. If discovery is successful the handles of discovered characteristics and descriptors will be set in pHdlList.

detaileddescription.para: Perform service and characteristic discovery for User Data service. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length UDSC_HDL_LIST_LEN. If discovery is successful the handles of discovered characteristics and descriptors will be set in pHdlList.

briefdescription.para: Parse a User Control Point message.

Process a value received in an ATT read response, notification, or indication message. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length UDSC_PLXS_HDL_LIST_LEN. If the attribute handle of the message matches a handle in the handle list the value is processed, otherwise it is ignored.

detaileddescription.para: Process a value received in an ATT read response, notification, or indication message. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length UDSC_HDL_LIST_LEN. If the ATT handle of the message matches a handle in the handle list the value is processed, otherwise it is ignored.

simplesect.para: ATT_SUCCESS if handle is found, ATT_ERR_NOT_FOUND otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Read the database change increment characteristic.
Write the database change increment characteristic.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t handle, uint16_t valueLen, uint8_t *pValue)
memberdef.name: udscWriteControlPoint

briefdescription.para: Write to the control point and set a timer waiting for the response.
Write to the user control point characteristic - Register New User.

briefdescription.para: Write to the user control point characteristic - Consent.

parameterdescription.para: Consent code (0-9999 - provided when user was registered)

briefdescription.para: Write to the user control point characteristic - Delete User Data.
